Description: Pop-up: Word Puzzle is a word puzzle game where the player must predict the correct the word base on the falling word clues. The player can use his/her 5 points to get a hint.
Summary: Do you think your vocabulary is good enough? hmmm. let see what you`ve got!
Features: Saving, Loading, Clearing of Saved data, Sound & Background FX, Leader board, Themes.
